selectPolicyPopup.title: Select Policy Group
selectPolicyPopup.description: Select policy group applicable to your organisation to proceed with enrolled partner type flow. Please ensure you go through the policy group description to confirm the policy group. After your selection is saved, you will not be able to modify the policy group again. Only one policy group is allowed per partner ID.

draftPoliciesDetectedMsg.header: Error: Policies detected in Draft status!
draftPoliciesDetectedMsg.description1: There are {{noOfDraftPolicies}} draft policies associated with this policy group. Policy Group cannot be deactivated until all associated draft policies are published and then deactivated. Please address the draft policies to proceed.
draftPoliciesDetectedMsg.description2: There is {{noOfDraftPolicies}} draft policy associated with this policy group. Policy Group cannot be deactivated until the associated draft policy is published and then deactivated. Please address the draft policy to proceed.

activeAndDraftPoliciesDetectedMsg.header: Error: Policies in Activated and Draft Status Detected!
activeAndDraftPoliciesDetectedMsg.description: There are {{noOfActivePolicies}} active policies and {{noOfDraftPolicies}} draft policies associated with this policy group. To proceed with deactivating the policy group, please ensure the following:
activeAndDraftPoliciesDetectedMsg.descriptionForSingularActive: There is {{noOfActivePolicies}} active policy and {{noOfDraftPolicies}} draft policies associated with this policy group. To proceed with deactivating the policy group, please ensure the following:
activeAndDraftPoliciesDetectedMsg.descriptionForSingularDraft: There are {{noOfActivePolicies}} active policies and {{noOfDraftPolicies}} draft policy associated with this policy group. To proceed with deactivating the policy group, please ensure the following:
activeAndDraftPoliciesDetectedMsg.descriptionForBothSingular: There is {{noOfActivePolicies}} active policy and {{noOfDraftPolicies}} draft policy associated with this policy group. To proceed with deactivating the policy group, please ensure the following:
activeAndDraftPoliciesDetectedMsg.descriptionMsg2: 2. Publish and then deactivate all draft policies.

consentPopup.title: Terms and Conditions
consentPopup.description: The data provided during registration, including your Name, Phone Number, Email Address, Organisation Name, and Address, will be used by the Partner Management Portal (PMP). Your email address will also be used for password resets. This information will be used solely to create your credentials, facilitating your use of MOSIP. By ticking the box below, you consent to submitting your data to be stored and processed for the above purpose.
